Publication Title: Dermatology evaluation for cutaneous immune-related adverse events is associated with improved survival in cancer patients treated with checkpoint inhibition
Publication Keywords: Immunotherapy, Skin Toxicity, Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor, Dermatology Consultation, Cutaneous Immune-related Adverse Event

Publication Title: X-CHIME enables combinatorial, inducible, lineage-specific and sequential knockout of genes in the immune system
Publication Authors: Martin W LaFleur, Ashlyn M Lemmen, Ivy S L Streeter, Thao H Nguyen, Lauren E Milling, Nicole M Derosia, Zachary M Hoffman, Jacob E Gillis, Qin Tjokrosurjo, Samuel C Markson, Amy Y Huang, Praju V Anekal, Paula Montero Llopis, W Nicholas Haining, John G Doench, Arlene H Sharpe
Publication Abstract: Annotation of immunologic gene function in vivo typically requires the generation of knockout mice, which is time consuming and low throughput. We previously developed CHimeric IMmune Editing (CHIME), a CRISPR-Cas9 bone marrow delivery system for constitutive, ubiquitous deletion of single genes.
